source.sqlReaderQuery:
select  E2.EQUIP_CLASS_ID, E2.EQUIP_CLASS_CD,
S.[TYPE] ,
  S.CODE ,
  S.DESP 
  from EI_EQUIP_CLASS_ITEMS_ASSOC E1 
 JOIN SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE S ON E1.GC_ITEM_CD = S.CODE
 JOIN EI_EQUIP_CLASS E2 ON E1.EQUIP_CLASS_ID = E2.EQUIP_CLASS_ID

Select  E2.EQUIP_CLASS_ID, E2.EQUIP_CLASS_CD,
S.[TYPE] ,
S.CODE ,
S.DESP 
from EI_EQUIP_CLASS_ITEMS_ASSOC E1 
JOIN SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE S ON E1.GC_ITEM_CD = S.CODE
JOIN EI_EQUIP_CLASS E2 ON E1.EQUIP_CLASS_ID = E2.EQUIP_CLASS_ID

SELECT
E1.EQUIP_CLASS_ID,
E2.EQUIP_CLASS_CD,
E1.ITEM_TYPE [TYPE],
S.CODE ,
S.DESP,
NULL as ParentCode
FROM dbo.EI_EQUIP_CLASS_ITEMS_ASSOC E1
LEFT OUTER JOIN  dbo.EI_EQUIP_CLASS E2 ON E1.EQUIP_CLASS_ID = E2.EQUIP_CLASS_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN  dbo.SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE S ON  E1.GC_ITEM_CD = S.CODE AND E1.ITEM_TYPE  = S.TYPE
WHERE ITEM_TYPE in ( 'IMPACT_CODE','FAILURE_SYMPTOM_CODE','FAILURE_CONSEQUENCE_CODE','FAILURE_CODE','FAILURE_CAUSE_CODE','FAILURE_ACTION_CODE','COMPONENT_CODE') and S.STATUS = 1
and E1.EQUIP_CLASS_ID is not null

SELECT
E1.EQUIP_CLASS_ID,
E2.EQUIP_CLASS_CD,
E1.ITEM_TYPE [TYPE],
S.CODE ,
S.DESP,
NULL as ParentCode
FROM dbo.EI_EQUIP_CLASS_ITEMS_ASSOC E1
LEFT OUTER JOIN  dbo.EI_EQUIP_CLASS E2 ON E1.EQUIP_CLASS_ID = E2.EQUIP_CLASS_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN  dbo.SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE S ON  E1.GC_ITEM_CD = S.CODE AND E1.ITEM_TYPE  = S.TYPE
WHERE ITEM_TYPE in ( 'IMPACT_CODE','FAILURE_SYMPTOM_CODE','FAILURE_CONSEQUENCE_CODE','FAILURE_CODE','FAILURE_CAUSE_CODE','FAILURE_ACTION_CODE','COMPONENT_CODE') and S.STATUS = 1
and E1.EQUIP_CLASS_ID is not null

SELECT 
  LINE_CD AS [Code], 
  LINE_NAME AS [Name],  
  'LINE' As [Type],
  '' ParentCode,
  '' DESP
FROM CO_LINE
  UNION
SELECT LOC_CD AS [Code], 
  LOC_NAME AS [Name],  
  'Location_DEPOT' As [Type],
  '' ParentCode,
  '' DESP
FROM
  CO_LOCATION
  where GC_LOC_TYPE_CD='DEPOT'
  UNION
SELECT CODE, '' as [Name], 'WORK_NATURE_Level1' AS [Type], ''  ParentCode, DESP
FROM SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE WHERE CODE in ('PM', 'CM') AND TYPE = 'WORK_NATURE'
UNION
SELECT CODE, '' as [Name], 'WORK_NATURE_Level2_PM' AS [Type], 'PM'  ParentCode, DESP
FROM SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE 
WHERE PARENT_GC_ID in 
(SELECT GC_ID FROM SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE CODE WHERE  CODE = 'PM' AND TYPE = 'WORK_NATURE')
UNION
SELECT CODE, '' as [Name], 'WORK_NATURE_Level2_CM' AS [Type], 'CM'  ParentCode, DESP
FROM SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE 
WHERE PARENT_GC_ID in 
(SELECT GC_ID FROM SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE CODE WHERE  CODE = 'CM' AND TYPE = 'WORK_NATURE')

SELECT 
  LINE_CD AS [Code],

  UNION

FROM SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE 
WHERE PARENT_GC_ID in 
(SELECT GC_ID FROM SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE CODE WHERE  CODE = 'CM' AND TYPE = 'WORK_NATURE')

SELECT 
  LINE_CD AS [Code],

  UNION
SELECT LOC_CD AS [Code],

SELECT CODE, '' as [Name], 'WORK_NATURE_Level1' AS [Type], ''  ParentCode, DESP

UNION
SELECT CODE, '' as [Name], 'WORK_NATURE_Level2_PM' AS [Type], 'PM'  ParentCode, DESP

FROM SA_SYS_GENERIC_CODE 
WHERE PARENT_GC_ID in

SELECT Distinct  STD_JOB_CD, STD_JOB_DESP, WK_GRP_CD,GC_WORK_NATURE_LVL1_CD,GC_WORK_NATURE_LVL2_CD,ESTIMATE_JOB_DUR
FROM xls_v_Standard_Job
WHERE GC_WORK_NATURE_LVL1_CD in ('CM')
and WK_GRP_CD like 'MR%'

SELECT Top 1  STD_JOB_CD, STD_JOB_DESP, WK_GRP_CD,GC_WORK_NATURE_LVL1_CD,GC_WORK_NATURE_LVL2_CD,ESTIMATE_JOB_DUR
FROM xls_v_Standard_Job
WHERE GC_WORK_NATURE_LVL1_CD in ('CM')
and WK_GRP_CD like 'MR%'

SELECT d.[EQUIP_CLASS_CD]
, c.[CTX_ID1]
, c.[CTX_ID2]
, c.[CTX_ID3]
, c.[CTX_ID4]
FROM [mmsdb].[dbo].[CO_UDF_SET_ASSOC] a
LEFT OUTER JOIN [mmsdb].[dbo].[CO_UDF_SET] b ON b.UDF_SET_ID = a.UDF_SET_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN [mmsdb].[dbo].[CO_UDF_ASSOC] c ON c.UDF_ASSOC_ID = b.[UDF_ASSOC_ID]
LEFT OUTER JOIN [mmsdb].[dbo].[EI_EQUIP_CLASS] d ON c.[CTX_ID1] = CAST(d.EQUIP_CLASS_ID AS CHAR)
WHERE c.GC_CTX_TYPE_CD = 'WO' AND c.CTX_ID2 <> 'C&R PROJECT WORKS' 
AND a.UDF_ID = (SELECT UDF_ID FROM [mmsdb].[dbo].[CO_UDF_DEF] WHERE UDF_NAME = 'Ref. Initial Delay (min)')
ORDER BY d.EQUIP_CLASS_CD

SELECT d.[EQUIP_CLASS_CD]
, c.[CTX_ID1]
, c.[CTX_ID2]
, c.[CTX_ID3]
, c.[CTX_ID4]
FROM [mmsdb].[dbo].[CO_UDF_SET_ASSOC] a
LEFT OUTER JOIN [mmsdb].[dbo].[CO_UDF_SET] b ON b.UDF_SET_ID = a.UDF_SET_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN [mmsdb].[dbo].[CO_UDF_ASSOC] c ON c.UDF_ASSOC_ID = b.[UDF_ASSOC_ID]
LEFT OUTER JOIN [mmsdb].[dbo].[EI_EQUIP_CLASS] d ON c.[CTX_ID1] = CAST(d.EQUIP_CLASS_ID AS CHAR)
WHERE c.GC_CTX_TYPE_CD = 'WO' AND c.CTX_ID2 <> 'C&R PROJECT WORKS' 
AND a.UDF_ID = (SELECT UDF_ID FROM [mmsdb].[dbo].[CO_UDF_DEF] WHERE UDF_NAME = 'Ref. Initial Delay (min)')
ORDER BY d.EQUIP_CLASS_CD

SELECT Distinct  STD_JOB_CD, STD_JOB_DESP, WK_GRP_CD,GC_WORK_NATURE_LVL1_CD,GC_WORK_NATURE_LVL2_CD,ESTIMATE_JOB_DUR
FROM xls_v_Standard_Job
WHERE GC_WORK_NATURE_LVL1_CD in ('CM')

SELECT Top 1  STD_JOB_CD, STD_JOB_DESP, WK_GRP_CD,GC_WORK_NATURE_LVL1_CD,GC_WORK_NATURE_LVL2_CD,ESTIMATE_JOB_DUR
FROM xls_v_Standard_Job
WHERE GC_WORK_NATURE_LVL1_CD in ('CM')
